examples: The railway line runs right past the house.
The clock says ten past two.
Not a single jot or tittle goes past the eye of the boss without her noticing.
The cat ran right past me and into the house.
His past comes back to hunt him when an old friend returns to his life.
words.defineEn: the time that has passed or gone by
words.defineVi: thời gian đã trôi qua hoặc trôi qua

examples: Their bread and butter is reporting local events.
The event finished with a spectacular fireworks display.
These events occurred within living memory.
The tragic event tore the community out of its sense of normalcy.
The paper’s bread and butter is reporting local events in a small community.
words.defineEn: anything that takes place, particularly something important
words.defineVi: bất cứ điều gì diễn ra, đặc biệt là một cái gì đó quan trọng

examples: The book describes her life from cradle to grave.
But the lawyers also described internal politics that at times slowed down the department's work or drove a wedge among members of the team.
And after the match, the Carlisle boss wasn't pulling his punches when describing his players' performance.
BBC is falling over backwards to be impartial by describing this as a crowd!
It was described as a large, luxury mobile home, but there was barely room to swing a cat.
words.defineEn: to give details about someone or something to say what they are like
words.defineVi: để cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó để nói họ như thế nào

examples: times 5 is 0.
times 15 is 0.
Work equals force times distance.
Work equals force times distance.
Work is force times distance.
words.defineEn: a distinct period of history or culture, or a specific moment or duration of time
words.defineVi: một giai đoạn lịch sử hoặc văn hóa riêng biệt, hoặc một thời điểm hoặc khoảng thời gian cụ thể

examples: Today is Monday.
The lawyers put another nail in her coffin today.
The euro hit a record low in trading today.
I saw a famous actress at the shopping mall today.
All winter coats are half-price today.
words.defineEn: the day that is taking place right now
words.defineVi: ngày đang diễn ra ngay bây giờ

examples: The days passed slowly.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The news really made my day.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twenty-four hours
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ hai mươi bốn giờ

examples: The actress was practicing her lines before the audition.
Her life had always run smoothly before.
We have had these mysteries before.
Have you ever used this software before?
The case was tried before a jury.
words.defineEn: ahead of someone or something in time, order, or importance
words.defineVi: trước một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó trong thời gian, trật tự, hoặc tầm quan trọng

examples: Temperatures hit 40° yesterday.
Yesterday he baked a loaf of whole wheat bread.
I handed in my notice yesterday.
I only started this book yesterday.
The battle lines were drawn yesterday for the fiercest contest in the history of local radio.
words.defineEn: the day before today; the previous day
words.defineVi: ngày trước ngày hôm nay; ngày hôm trước

examples: Three players got their marching orders last week.
Company profits took a tumble last year.
Our cat produced kittens last week.
A wonder lasts but nine days.
That marriage won't last.
Three players got their marching orders last week.
Our cat produced kittens last week.
My parents give me pocket money every week.
The rebels held the town for many weeks.
The week is divided into seven days.
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of seven days in a calendar
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ bảy ngày trong lịch

examples: The agreement followed months of negotiation.
The school semester starts next month.
We have a family gathering every month.
The permit runs for three months.
Each month she holds a meeting with her entire staff.
words.defineEn: each of the twelve named divisions of the year, like January, February, etc.
words.defineVi: mỗi phần trong số mười hai phần được đặt tên của năm, như tháng Giêng, tháng Hai, v.v.

examples: This job puts years on you.
The apple tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every year.
Cancer kills thousands of people every year.
The apple orchard typically yields a bountiful harvest each year.
Company profits took a tumble last year.
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twelve months, particularly one that starts on January first and ends on December thirty-first
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ mười hai tháng, đặc biệt là một tháng bắt đầu vào ngày đầu tiên của tháng một và kết thúc vào ngày 31 tháng 12

examples: Tuesdays usually are my busiest days at work.
The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
The party will be on Tuesday, rain or shine.
I use Tuesdays to work on my personal projects and hobbies.
I meet my study group at the library on Tuesday afternoons.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Monday

examples: The most recent incident happened only a week ago.
But that was a long time ago.
I had a brush with him a number of years ago.
He should have been given the boot years ago.
Until three years ago, I could have slept for England.
words.defineEn: used to refer to a time in the past, showing how much time has passed before the present moment
words.defineVi: dùng để chỉ một thời điểm trong quá khứ, cho thấy thời gian đã trôi qua bao lâu trước thời điểm hiện tại
